subsection_analysis.refined_text: Fill in PDF Forms Is the form fillable? Not all forms are fillable.
Create a blank PDF You can create a blank PDF, rather than beginning with a file, a clipboard image, or scanning. This process can be useful for creating a one-page PDF.

• Did you enter the email addresses of clients, agents, and other • Customize Your Message • Have you added a personal touch to the subject and message fields, highlighting key property details? • Create and Share the Link • Did you generate a shareable link and copy it for distribution?
Chrome or Microsoft Edge. AI Assistant is also available on phones through Acrobat mobile apps (iOS and Android).
Certify options provide a higher level of document control than Digitally sign. For documents that require certification, you must certify the documents before others sign them.
